extensionDescription.message: This add-on allows you to automatically change your passwords.

delete_blueprint_warning.message: The blueprint for $1 will be deleted. Do you want to continue?

no_login_data.message: No login data found in the password manager

acclmessage1.message: The Password Changer will now start a new recording on $1. Do you want to continue?

acclmessage2.message: This entry will be deleted out of this list and out of the password manager of firefox.

acclmessage3.message: The password will be changed automatically. This happens live in an active window. Because of a bug in the Firefox API, this can't be done the background.

acclmessage4.message: You will be navigated to the form with which you can change your password on your own.

heading_blueprints.message: These sites are available as blueprints

imitator change failed.message: There was an error while changing the password. It may be possible that the password was changed anyway, but the password was not saved in the password manager.

imitator change failed new password is.message: In that case the password would be $1.

imitator failed to save new password old.message: The old password was deleted, but the new password could not be saved. Please use the password reset function of the website.

imitator failed to save new password alr.message: The password was possibly changed, but could not be saved in the password manager. Please use the password reset function of the website.

recorder_failed_saving_new_password.message: The new password could not be saved.

store_password_failed_missing_informatio.message: The new password could not be stored in the password manager, because some necessary information to do so is missing.

has_entry.message: There is an entry in the passwordmanager

has_no_entry.message: There is no entry in passwordmanager

export-blueprint-tooltip.message: Export the blueprint as JSON to disk

instructions_manualPWChange1.message: Please enter a new password for the following website.

instructions_manualPWChange2.message: All the required password policies of the website are displayed below.

instructions_manualPWChange3.message: Alternatively, generate a cryptographically secure password.

instructions_manualPWChange4.message: Once all password policies are fulfilled, the automatic change process can be started.

recording=successful.message: Recording was successful. Blueprint was saved to storage and the password has been updated.

recording-failed-no-new-password.message: Recording failed. No new password was entered.

recording-failed-no-password-policy.message: Recording failed. No password policy was specified.

recording-failed-no-new-password-labeled.message: Recording failed. No field was labeled as new password.

recording-failed-no-site-load-after-new-.message: Recording failed. No site load happened after labeling a field as new password.

recording-failed-invalid-password-policy.message: Recording failed. The password policy is invalid.
